56 Horror In Spain: Woman Tortured And Burned Alive For A Week By Algerian Immigrants posted 3 hours ago by perma-maga 4 comments award share report block Mario Nawfal @MarioNawfal • 1d 🇪🇸 HORROR IN SPAIN: WOMAN TORTURED AND BURNED ALIVE FOR A WEEK BY ALGERIAN IMMIGRANTS Eva, a Spanish woman, was kidnapped, raped, and tortured for seven days by three Algerian immigrants in Spain, burned with a blowtorch and left with second and third-degree burns over her body. Mario Nawfal @MarioNawfal • 1M 🇪🇸 ILLEGAL MIGRATION IN SPAIN: SAME CRISIS, NEW ROUTES The Spanish government says illegal migration is “down” in 2025, but the numbers tell a different story. Nearly 28,000 migrants have arrived so far this year, which looks lower than 2024, yet it is basically the same as
